lead_paragraph: New Delhi's Feroz Shah Kotla ground has three more days to acquire the necessary paperwork to retain hosting rights for matches at the World Twenty20 tournament starting next month, the Indian cricket board (BCCI) said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Indian Board to Make Delhi T20 Venue Decision on Monday
headline.main: Indian Board to Make Delhi T20 Venue Decision on Monday
